io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Shapes

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.NanoleafDevice
      • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Shapes

  • public class Shapes
extends NanoleafDevice
    The Shapes class is one of the three main concrete classes for creating a NanoleafDevice. This class should only be used to connect to physical Hexagons, Triangles, or Mini Triangles (Nanoleaf Shapes) devices. For other devices such as the Canvas or Hexagons, use the Aurora and Canvas classes, respectively.

      • Shapes

        public Shapes(String hostname,
              int port,
              String accessToken)
       throws NanoleafException,
              IOException
        Creates a new instance of the Shapes controller.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname of the controller
        port - the port of the controller (default=16021)
        accessToken - a unique authentication token
        Throws:
        NanoleafException - If the access token is invalid
        IOException - If an HTTP exception occurs

      • Shapes

        public Shapes(String hostname,
              int port,
              String accessToken,
              NanoleafCallback<Shapes> callback)
        Asynchronously creates a new instance of the Shapes.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname of the Shapes
        port - the port of the Shapes (default=16021)
        accessToken - a unique authentication token
        callback - the callback that is called when the device has been initialized
        Throws:
        NanoleafException - If the access token is invalid
        IOException - If an HTTP exception occurs

        public List<Panel> getNeighborPanels(Panel panel,
                                     List<Panel> panels)
        Description copied from class: NanoleafDevice
        Gets the direct neighbors of a specific origin panel (i.e., the panels that are directly connected to a specific panel).
        Specified by:
        getNeighborPanels in class NanoleafDevice
        Parameters:
        panel - the origin panel
        panels - all the panels of the Nanoleaf device
        Returns:
        a list of the direct neighbors

      • getShapeType

        public ShapeType getShapeType()

        Gets the shape type of the Shapes panels.

        Important: This method is incomplete. There is currently no obvious way to determine the exact type of a Shapes device. This method will return the shape type for hexagon panels as a placeholder.

        Specified by:
        getShapeType in class NanoleafDevice
        Returns:
        the device panel shape

      • getControllerShapeType

        public ShapeType getControllerShapeType()
        Gets the shape of the Shapes controller. This will always return a shape type with type ShapeType.SHAPES_CONTROLLER
        Specified by:
        getControllerShapeType in class NanoleafDevice
        Returns:
        a shapes controller shape type
